industrial.title: 50+ years of industrial expertise
industrial.text-1: OSTIM Global is the international platform of the OSTIM industrial ecosystem, bringing over 50 years of experience in organized industrial zones to Uzbekistan. The project combines proven management models, ready infrastructure and long-term investment vision.
industrial.subtitle: Meet the industrial ecosystem
industrial.text-2: Today, OSTIM Global is developing the Turkish–Uzbek Industrial Zone, creating a fully integrated environment for production, investment and sustainable growth.

revolution.title: Designed for industrial scale
revolution.desc: Integrated roads and logistics for efficient operations
revolution.services-desc: Administrative & support services. Services supporting daily operations
revolution.roads-desc: Roads & internal transport. Direct access and efficient internal mobility

overview.title: Inside the Uzbek–Turkish Industrial Zone
texts: The Uzbek–Turkish Industrial Zone OSTIM Global is a large-scale industrial project located in Tashkent, developed under the management model of OSTIM — one of Türkiye’s leading organized industrial zones. The project operates based on a decision of the Government of Uzbekistan dated December 15, 2023.

By transferring more than 50 years of industrial zone expertise to Uzbekistan, OSTIM Global is creating a modern production environment built on integrated infrastructure, sustainable development and long-term investment vision.
OSTIM Global represents a new stage of industrial development, strengthening cooperation between Türkiye and Uzbekistan and contributing to the country’s industrial transformation.

network.coop: Cooperation with more than 20 countries for implementation

hero.title: Inside the Uzbek–Turkish Industrial Zone
texts: OSTIM GLOBAL /endline/ Cooperation and innovative solutions in industry. OSTIM Global is the international organization representing the OSTIM Organized Industrial Zone, one of the most reputable industrial zones in Türkiye. With more than 50 years of experience, OSTIM has built a leading industrial and manufacturing ecosystem and established strong business relationships with both local and international investors.

Turkish–Uzbek Industrial Zone “OSTIM GLOBAL” /endline/ OSTIM Global plays an active role in the development of the Turkish–Uzbek Industrial Zone, providing technical expertise, investment support, and industrial management to ensure the successful implementation of the project. Aiming to create a long-term and sustainable production hub for industrial investors, OSTIM Global will make a significant contribution to Uzbekistan’s industrial transformation.

card-1.text: Uzbekistan is a trade hub of Central Asia and a strategic logistics center with access to regional and international markets.
card-1.title: Strategic Location

card-2.text: Infrastructure built to international standards ensures uninterrupted production, reliable power supply, water, and high-speed internet.
card-2.title: Modern Infrastructure

card-3.text: The OSTIM Global cluster model enables cooperation with leading companies, joint R&D projects, and increased competitiveness.
card-3.title: Cluster Synergy

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.text: Government institutions, industrial organizations, and strategic partners supporting the OSTIM Global ecosystem.

info.title: Innovative AI projects
info.text: Our solutions help investors optimize operations, improve productivity, and accelerate industrial growth.

cards.label: Service
cards.title: One-Stop Service
cards.text: OSTIM Global simplifies the process of obtaining permits and licenses, accelerating the launch of investment projects.

cards.label: Social
cards.title: Social Environment
cards.text: Residential, medical, educational, and sports facilities create comfortable conditions for both living and working.

cards.label: Logistics
cards.title: Logistics and Supply Chain
cards.text: Developed logistics and efficient supply chain management reduce costs and accelerate product delivery.

cards.label: Education
cards.title: Skilled Workforce
cards.text: Partnerships with universities and technical colleges provide access to a young and well-trained workforce.

future.title: Building the Industrial Future Together
texts: The Uzbek–Turkish Industrial Zone is built on the principles of sustainability, innovation, and long-term industrial growth. OSTIM Global brings over 50 years of Türkiye’s industrial zone experience to Uzbekistan, creating a new generation of organized industrial development in Central Asia.

Investors are invited to become part of a managed industrial ecosystem that combines ready infrastructure, cluster-based development, education–industry cooperation, and a one-stop support model—enabling seamless integration into regional and global markets.

section-cta.title: Industrial power built on experience
section-cta.text: OSTIM Global creates an integrated industrial environment where infrastructure, management and international cooperation enable efficient production and sustainable growth.
